## Deferred type

A Deferred is an object to control a Promise outside of executor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Deferred<T> = {
    resolve(val?: T | PromiseLike<T>): void;
    reject(err?: any): void;
    promise: Promise<T>;
};
```
